title.select_event_type: What kind of tickets do you have?
title.search: Search by event, category or keyword

description.alert_desc: Get notified when a ticket becomes available.
description.change_email: To change your email, we'll send you a confirmation email to verify your email address.
description.change_phone: To change your phone, we will send you a confirmation phonenumber to verify your SMS address.
description.already_sent_otp: We have already sent the OTP code to {{address}}, check and confirm.
description.new_event_name_desc: Find the official name inside your tickets or on the Facebook event page.
description.new_event_link_desc: It helps potential buyers verify that this is the event they're looking for.
description.new_event_alert: Your event will not be visible immediately as it needs to be verified first.
description.add_new_ticket: Fans will only be able to see the tickets after purchasing them.
description.add_new_ticket_desc: There are no ticket archives for this event. To sell your tickets, open the original email confirmation you received after purchasing and click on the “Sell Ticket” button.
description.add_new_ticket_note: For this type of ticket, you cannot modify additional information.
description.set_price: We've detected that you paid BRL {{price}} per ticket. To be fair, you can sell for up to 120% above the original price of your ticket.
description.include_transaction: You earn 5% more for the commission and 3% for the transaction
description.ticket_avatar: Help us put a face to your name! Fans will feel much safer buying tickets if they have an idea of who is selling them.
description.ticket_finalize: Make sure all information is correct and put your ticket on sale!
description.ticket_share: We'll send you a notification when it's sold! Share your ad in the options below to increase the chances of selling your ticket(s).
description.select_event: What event do you want to sell tickets for, {{fullName}}?
description.select_event_buy: Which kind of event tickets do you want to buy , {{fullName}}? Please search by Event name, venue on bellow list
description.select_event_type: Keep in mind that you can only sell tickets for one type at a time. If you have multiple ticket types, you'll need to create a separate listing for each one.
description.reset_confirm: Do you want to reset the current operation? If you proceed with this operation, the saved data will be erased from the database. Is everything ok?
description.no_data: There is no data to display.
description.empty_cart: Try searching for events, categories or keywords in the field below. The moment you find an event, add it to the cart, it will be shown on this page.
description.empty_ticket: You don't have tickets for any upcoming events.
description.my_tickets: Below are the tickets you purchased.
description.payment: Choose your preferred payment method. We'll save your preference for next time.
description.my_listing: Below are the yields you have put up for sale.
description.empty_my_listing: You don't have any ads yet. Click below to start your sales journey!
description.want: What do you want to do?
description.following: An overview of everything you follow on FanTicket
description.payments: An overview of all your payments
description.basic_fields: Our payment provider needs some additional information before we can pay you. This may include your address, date of birth, etc.
description.certificate: Our payment provider needs your passport or ID to provide additional verification.
description.identity_verification: Sometimes our payment provider asks for additional proof of address to complete your verification.
description.about: FanTicket is a platform for selling and buying tickets between people. A practical and safe reference for fans, which promotes the meeting of interests and the best experience at concerts, parties, festivals, games, theater and much more. FanTicket CNPJ 123.123.123/0001-12
description.add_new_ticket_revise: Every time your list is created, fans will be able to buy their tickets right away!
description.to_access_ticket: To access tickets, fans need to make payment for them first.
description.billing_address: We only need your address to ensure the security of your payment.
description.add_phone_desc: We will send you a text message informing you of the sale of tickets. Your cell phone number will not be disclosed.
description.cart: Your tickets are reserved for 10 minutes.
description.conversation: You don't have any active conversations yet. Conversations between buyers and sellers will only start under unusual circumstances.
description.search_events: Find the best events, on the best day or category for you.
description.notification: You still don't have any notifications.
description.email_sent_before: Please open the link we just sent to
description.email_sent_after: and you will be connected automatically!
description.per_ticket: per ticket (you will receive R$ {{price}} per ticket)
description.necessary_login_account: It is necessary to have a login account
description.necessary_login_account_desc: To be able to access this you need to have a ticket account
description.exchange_ticket: We will exchange the original ticket for a new one for 100% security
description.type_require_account: Please type the required account details
description.delete_ticket: Please delete the selected ticket file first

label.CPF: Bank account document number (CPF or CNPJ)
label.email_preferences_desc: Control which emails you want to receive

message.not_found_event: No results found. Search for an event, venue or city
